instructions: On your iOS or iPadOS device, go to Settings > [ your name ] > iCloud > Manage Storage > Backups. Tap the name of your device, then, under Choose Data to Back Up, turn Backup for each app on or off. The amount of iCloud storage each app uses is shown below each app in the list. The apps list may be abbreviated. Tap Show All Apps to see a complete list. Some Apple apps back up data in iCloud but aren t included in the list of apps. You can only turn off backup for listed apps.
